directions: In a bowl whisk together oregano, cumin, zest, lemon juice, and salt and pepper to taste and whisk in oil in a stream until dressing is emulsified. Add carrots and toss to combine well.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons fresh oregano leaves, chopped fine
1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste
1 pound carrots (about 8 medium), peeled and shredded fine
title: Carrot Salad with Oregano and Cumin
